level.heading: Establishment of the Corporation; purposes; Waterfront Framework Plan; consistency with other plans; general powers of the corporation.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 102 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-219
level.text: For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1223.01.
